{{Infobox Peripheral NOS |image1 = |image1_size = |caption = Lexar Professional Workflow CFR1 CompactFlash/USB 3.0 Reader |caption2 = |pp = |sp = |dl = |wikidevi = |wikipedia = |brand = Lexar |model = LRWCFR1 |submodelappend = |submodel = RBNA |revision = |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 01/13/2014 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Lexar Professional Workflow CFR1 |sernum = |series = |if = USB |if_bus_version = 3.0 |if_connector_type = Female B |form_factor = corded (modular) adapter |vendor_id = 05dc |device_id = ba02 |subvendor_id = |subdevice_id = |id_string = |windosid = |fcc_id = |icid = |us_id = |boardid = |ecc_id = |oui = |chip1 = Genesys Logic;GL3233;GL3233, MS1AB02Y02, 316PKY75200;;LQFP-64; |chip2 = |chip3 = |chip4 = |linuxdriv = |win_driver = |is_manuf = No |manuf = |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |addl_chips = |flags = CompactFlash |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category = card reader |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = |estreldate = 09/16/2013 |price = |upc = 650590180141 |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B00EJ8CKPC |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |manuf_country = China |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== :UDMA-7 (Ultra ATA/167) cards are supported by this reader. "HERRADURA", "CF Card REV:0.1", and "102/06/20" is silkscreened on the board. :P/N: '''508-64667 Rev B''' This reader has a single LED. *It is '''off''' when media is not present. *It is '''on''' when media is present. *It will '''blink''' with activity. It is capable of 96 Mo/s / 96 MB/s transfers, with UDMA5 card. :Atech Flash might be the ODM of these products. Some AFT products in usb.org :certified list have same model numbers as Lexar products ([http://www.usb.org/kcompliance/view/view_item?item_key=76712092aaf023aee12345cb1ef9782f47358b8c such as LRW300U]). {{SCollapse|lsusb |
